alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Buchanan; De Kalb; Gentry; Holt; Nodaway (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 12:24AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Doniphan, north central Buchanan, southwestern Gentry, eastern Holt, southern Nodaway, Andrew and northwestern DeKalb Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1223 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Skidmore to near Maitland to near Forest City. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Joseph, Maryville, Savannah, Wathena, Elwood, Highland, Troy, Country Club Villa, Country Club, King City, Oregon, Ravenwood, Union Star, Maitland, Amazonia, Skidmore, Forest City, Fillmore, Barnard and Conception Junction. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 43 and 77. Interstate 229 between mile markers 0 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Andrew; Buchanan; De Kalb; Gentry; Holt; Nodaway
